-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Post ID:3116
Sender:"ProLibertad Campaign" <prolibertad@...>
Post Date/Time:2002-12-19 08:42:03
Subject:3 Kings 10 Political prisoners 1 Struggle
Message:

The ProLibertad Freedom Campaign is making a call to all progressive
organizations; ProLibertad and The Venceremos Brigade (the oldest solidarity 
organization around Cuba that goes to Cuba annually to work on civic 
projects in support of the revolution)are organizing a special fundraiser 
for the Cuban Five and the Puerto Rican Political Prisoners.

In order to endorse, we ask organizations to donate $25 as a special
commissary gift for the Cuban Five. We are trying to raise $2500 for the 
Cuban Five as a special Three Kings Commissary Gift.

If you are interested in endorsing please email ProLibertad
(ProLibertad@...) with your response so that we can add your name to 
the announcement emails and to the special Three Kings activity webpage on 
the ProLibertad website.

Please send your endorsement fee to:

IFCO/ProLibertad/Cuban Five
402 w145th St.
New York, NY 10031
________________________________________________________________________

Three Kings!! 10 Political Prisoners!! 1 Struggle!!

A special Three Kings CELEBRATION/ Night of Poetry for the Puerto Rican and 
the Cuban Political Prisoners!! Sponsored by the Venceremos Brigade and The 
ProLibertad Freedom Campaign!!

Saturday January 4th, 2003 At 6:30pm
St. Mary's Church 521 W126th St.(between Broadway and Amsterdam Avenue)

Invited Poets: SANDRA MARIA ESTEVEZ, AND LUIS REYES RIVERA

ALL OF THIS FOR JUST A $10 DONATION

The Puerto Rican Political Prisoners and Prisoners of War are imprisoned for 
struggling (or in some cases simply supporting) Puerto Rican Independence 
from the U.S.

The Cuban Political Prisoners are imprisoned for defending Cuba
by infiltrating terrorist organizations based in the U.S.

For more information call 718-601-4751

ENDORSING ORGANIZATIONS:
New Black Panther Party
FREE MUMIA COALITION
Where we live, WBAI
Cuba in focus, WBAI
Know Thy Self Speakers Bureau
Bring da noise productions(speaking truth to power for the hiphop 
generation),
La Iglesia san Juan Bautista
Iglesia San Romero de Las Americas
Uptown for Peace with Justice
IFCO/Pastors fro Peace
Free the Five Committee
SALAAM





_________________________________________________________________
The new MSN 8: smart spam protection and 2 months FREE*  
http://join.msn.com/?page=features/junkmail

The ProLibertad Freedom Campaign is making a call to all progressive
organizations; ProLibertad and The Venceremos Brigade (the oldest solidarity 
organization around Cuba that goes to Cuba annually to work on civic 
projects in support of the revolution)are organizing a special fundraiser 
for the Cuban Five and the Puerto Rican Political Prisoners.

In order to endorse, we ask organizations to donate $25 as a special
commissary gift for the Cuban Five. We are trying to raise $2500 for the 
Cuban Five as a special Three Kings Commissary Gift.

(ProLibertad@...) with your response so that we can add your name to 
the announcement emails and to the special Three Kings activity webpage on

struggling (or in some cases simply supporting) Puerto Rican Independence 
from the U.S.

organizations; ProLibertad and The Venceremos Brigade (the oldest solidarity 
organization around Cuba that goes to Cuba annually to work on civic 
projects in support of the revolution)are organizing a special fundraiser

Subject:Jan. 4th Three Kings Activity
Message:

The ProLibertad Freedom Campaign is making a call to all progressive
organizations; ProLibertad and The Venceremos Brigade (the oldest solidarity 
organization around Cuba that goes to Cuba annually to work on civic 
projects in support of the revolution)are organizing a special fundraiser 
for the Cuban Five and the Puerto Rican Political Prisoners.

In order to endorse, we ask organizations to donate $25 as a special
commissary gift for the Cuban Five. We are trying to raise $2500 for the 
Cuban Five as a special Three Kings Commissary Gift.

If you are interested in endorsing please email ProLibertad
(ProLibertad@...) with your response so that we can add your name to 
the announcement emails and to the special Three Kings activity webpage on 
the ProLibertad website.

Please send your endorsement fee to:

IFCO/ProLibertad/Cuban Five
402 w145th St.
New York, NY 10031

the Cuban Political Prisoners!! Sponsored by the Venceremos Brigade and The 
ProLibertad Freedom Campaign!!

Saturday January 4th, 2003 At 6:30pm
St. Mary's Church 521 W126th St.(between Broadway and Amsterdam Avenue)

Invited Poets:
SANDRA MARIA ESTEVEZ
LUIS REYES RIVERA
REV. PEDRO PIETRI

ALL OF THIS FOR JUST A $10 DONATION

The Puerto Rican Political Prisoners and Prisoners of War are imprisoned for 
struggling (or in some cases simply supporting) Puerto Rican Independence 
from the U.S.

The Cuban Political Prisoners are imprisoned for defending Cuba
by infiltrating terrorist organizations based in the U.S.

generation),

Sender:"ProLibertad Campaign" <prolibertad@...>
Post Date/Time:2002-12-29 18:42:09
Subject:Jan. 4th-Three Kings Activity
Message:

The ProLibertad Freedom Campaign is making a call to all progressive
organizations; ProLibertad and The Venceremos Brigade (the oldest solidarity 
organization around Cuba that goes to Cuba annually to work on civic 
projects in support of the revolution)are organizing a special fundraiser 
for the Cuban Five and the Puerto Rican Political Prisoners.

In order to endorse, we ask organizations to donate $25 as a special
commissary gift for the Cuban Five. We are trying to raise $2500 for the 
Cuban Five as a special Three Kings Commissary Gift.

If you are interested in endorsing please email ProLibertad
(ProLibertad@...) with your response so that we can add your name to 
the announcement emails and to the special Three Kings activity webpage on 
the ProLibertad website.

Please send your endorsement fee to:

IFCO/ProLibertad/Cuban Five
402 w145th St.
New York, NY 10031

the Cuban Political Prisoners!! Sponsored by the Venceremos Brigade and The 
ProLibertad Freedom Campaign!!

St. Mary's Church 521 W126th St.(between Broadway and Amsterdam Avenue)

Invited Poets:
SANDRA MARIA ESTEVEZ
LUIS REYES RIVERA
REV. PEDRO PIETRI

ALL OF THIS FOR JUST A $10 DONATION

The Puerto Rican Political Prisoners and Prisoners of War are imprisoned for 
struggling (or in some cases simply supporting) Puerto Rican Independence 
from the U.S.

The Cuban Political Prisoners are imprisoned for defending Cuba
by infiltrating terrorist organizations based in the U.S.

For more information call 718-601-4751

Post ID:3123
Sender:"ProLibertad Campaign" <prolibertad@...>
Post Date/Time:2002-12-29 18:42:50
Subject:Jan. 4th-Three Kings Activity
Message:

The ProLibertad Freedom Campaign is making a call to all progressive
organizations; ProLibertad and The Venceremos Brigade (the oldest solidarity 
organization around Cuba that goes to Cuba annually to work on civic 
projects in support of the revolution)are organizing a special fundraiser 
for the Cuban Five and the Puerto Rican Political Prisoners.

In order to endorse, we ask organizations to donate $25 as a special
commissary gift for the Cuban Five. We are trying to raise $2500 for the 
Cuban Five as a special Three Kings Commissary Gift.

If you are interested in endorsing please email ProLibertad
(ProLibertad@...) with your response so that we can add your name to 
the announcement emails and to the special Three Kings activity webpage on 
the ProLibertad website.

Please send your endorsement fee to:

IFCO/ProLibertad/Cuban Five
402 w145th St.
New York, NY 10031

St. Mary's Church 521 W126th St.(between Broadway and Amsterdam Avenue)

Invited Poets:
SANDRA MARIA ESTEVEZ
LUIS REYES RIVERA
REV. PEDRO PIETRI

ALL OF THIS FOR JUST A $10 DONATION

The Puerto Rican Political Prisoners and Prisoners of War are imprisoned for 
struggling (or in some cases simply supporting) Puerto Rican Independence 
from the U.S.

The Cuban Political Prisoners are imprisoned for defending Cuba
by infiltrating terrorist organizations based in the U.S.

For more information call 718-601-4751

Post ID:3124
Sender:"ProLibertad Campaign" <prolibertad@...>
Post Date/Time:2002-12-30 14:26:57
Subject:Cuba Activities-Jan 4th and 8th
Message:

The ProLibertad Freedom Campaign is making a call to all progressive
organizations; ProLibertad and The Venceremos Brigade (the oldest solidarity 
organization around Cuba that goes to Cuba annually to work on civic 
projects in support of the revolution)are organizing a special fundraiser 
for the Cuban Five and the Puerto Rican Political Prisoners.

In order to endorse, we ask organizations to donate $25 as a special
commissary gift for the Cuban Five. We are trying to raise $2500 for the 
Cuban Five as a special Three Kings Commissary Gift.

If you are interested in endorsing please email ProLibertad
(ProLibertad@...) with your response so that we can add your name to 
the announcement emails and to the special Three Kings activity webpage on 
the ProLibertad website.

Please send your endorsement fee to:

IFCO/ProLibertad/Cuban Five
402 w145th St.
New York, NY 10031
________________________________________________________________________

Three Kings!! 10 Political Prisoners!! 1 Struggle!!

A special Three Kings CELEBRATION/ Night of Poetry for the Puerto Rican and 
the Cuban Political Prisoners!! Sponsored by the Venceremos Brigade and The 
ProLibertad Freedom Campaign!!

Saturday January 4th, 2003 At 6:30pm
St. Mary's Church 521 W126th St.(between Broadway and Amsterdam Avenue)

Invited Poets:
SANDRA MARIA ESTEVEZ
LUIS REYES RIVERA
REV. PEDRO PIETRI

ALL OF THIS FOR JUST A $10 DONATION

The Puerto Rican Political Prisoners and Prisoners of War are imprisoned for 
struggling (or in some cases simply supporting) Puerto Rican Independence 
from the U.S.

The Cuban Political Prisoners are imprisoned for defending Cuba
by infiltrating terrorist organizations based in the U.S.

For more information call 718-601-4751

ENDORSING ORGANIZATIONS:
New Black Panther Party
FREE MUMIA COALITION
Where we live, WBAI
Cuba in focus, WBAI
Know Thy Self Speakers Bureau
Bring da noise productions(speaking truth to power for the hiphop
generation),
La Iglesia san Juan Bautista
Iglesia San Romero de Las Americas
Uptown for Peace with Justice
IFCO/Pastors for Peace
Free the Five Committee
SALAAM
National Network on Cuba
Stand Up New York
ANARCHIST BLACK CROSS FEDERATION-NORTHEAST BRANCH
Jeanine Maland
Asociacion Pro Derechos de los Confinados
Yuri Kochiyama
________________________________________________________________________

Join us on Wednesday, Jan 8, 6:00 pm to the Fifth Ave Presbyterian Church, 5 
W 55th St,

Hear: a speaker from the Cuban Mission to the United Nations and Jane 
Franklin, author of Cuba and the United States: A Chronological History.  
They will present an update on the new developments in US-Cuban relations.

sponsored by the NYC Friendshipment Committee, IFCO/Pastors for Peace

ALSO: save the date:  Join us at dance at the Brecht Forum on Sat, Feb 8

"Let us not love in word: but in deed and in truth." 1 John 3:18

IFCO/Pastors for Peace
402 W 145th Street, New York, NY 10031
212-926-5757; fax: 212-926-5842; web: http://www.ifconews.org

Post ID:3125
Sender:"ProLibertad Campaign" <prolibertad@...>
Post Date/Time:2002-12-30 14:27:43
Subject:Cuba Activities-Jan. 4th and 8th
Message:

The ProLibertad Freedom Campaign is making a call to all progressive
organizations; ProLibertad and The Venceremos Brigade (the oldest solidarity 
organization around Cuba that goes to Cuba annually to work on civic 
projects in support of the revolution)are organizing a special fundraiser 
for the Cuban Five and the Puerto Rican Political Prisoners.

In order to endorse, we ask organizations to donate $25 as a special
commissary gift for the Cuban Five. We are trying to raise $2500 for the 
Cuban Five as a special Three Kings Commissary Gift.

If you are interested in endorsing please email ProLibertad
(ProLibertad@...) with your response so that we can add your name to 
the announcement emails and to the special Three Kings activity webpage on 
the ProLibertad website.

Please send your endorsement fee to:

IFCO/ProLibertad/Cuban Five
402 w145th St.
New York, NY 10031
________________________________________________________________________

Three Kings!! 10 Political Prisoners!! 1 Struggle!!

A special Three Kings CELEBRATION/ Night of Poetry for the Puerto Rican and 
the Cuban Political Prisoners!! Sponsored by the Venceremos Brigade and The 
ProLibertad Freedom Campaign!!

Saturday January 4th, 2003 At 6:30pm
St. Mary's Church 521 W126th St.(between Broadway and Amsterdam Avenue)

Invited Poets:
SANDRA MARIA ESTEVEZ
LUIS REYES RIVERA
REV. PEDRO PIETRI

ALL OF THIS FOR JUST A $10 DONATION

The Puerto Rican Political Prisoners and Prisoners of War are imprisoned for 
struggling (or in some cases simply supporting) Puerto Rican Independence 
from the U.S.

The Cuban Political Prisoners are imprisoned for defending Cuba
by infiltrating terrorist organizations based in the U.S.

For more information call 718-601-4751

ENDORSING ORGANIZATIONS:
New Black Panther Party
FREE MUMIA COALITION
Where we live, WBAI
Cuba in focus, WBAI
Know Thy Self Speakers Bureau
Bring da noise productions(speaking truth to power for the hiphop
generation),

Jeanine Maland
Asociacion Pro Derechos de los Confinados
Yuri Kochiyama
________________________________________________________________________

Join us on Wednesday, Jan 8, 6:00 pm to the Fifth Ave Presbyterian Church, 5 
W 55th St,

Hear: a speaker from the Cuban Mission to the United Nations and Jane 
Franklin, author of Cuba and the United States: A Chronological History.  
They will present an update on the new developments in US-Cuban relations.

sponsored by the NYC Friendshipment Committee, IFCO/Pastors for Peace

ALSO: save the date:  Join us at dance at the Brecht Forum on Sat, Feb 8

"Let us not love in word: but in deed and in truth." 1 John 3:18
